description: Trystan Bull is back because so many of you loved everything about this hunk. He's gorgeous, and better yet, he's only in his early twenties. A recap of what this guy's all about: When he's not making money at clubs around North America, he's working out or spending time(and money) with beautiful women.He loves his body, and wanted to show it off. What better way to get exposure than on the net? For this smoking hot scene, Trystan treats us to his hot body in the pool, in the gym and in the bathroom, where he gets himself off all over the tile floor.Enjoy!
title: Trystan Bull
